# Luxora Style Guide

> Generated by dsys — do not edit manually. Re-run dsys to regenerate.

This design system is bold and editorial — not clean or neutral. It carries a deep forest-green identity against warm off-white surfaces, expressed through confident typography and a restrained palette that never drifts toward generic defaults. The palette is intentionally narrow: forest green, near-white warm sage, and a vivid pink accent form the entire chromatic identity — no blues, no neutrals, no grays. Satoshi is the sole typeface: a geometric sans with a confident, slightly editorial register that reads as youthful and elegant rather than corporate or utilitarian. Weight is used assertively — bold on hero text, semibold on subheadings — never thin or light, which would undermine the system's fresh, bold character. Spacing is comfortable, not cramped or spacious: the 4px grid at comfortable density keeps layouts breathable without wasting real estate on a mobile-first retail canvas. This system is NOT a minimalist SaaS dashboard with rounded pill buttons and slate-gray typography: avoid `rounded-full` on buttons, avoid any Tailwind gray/slate/zinc scale class. This system is NOT a corporate productivity tool: avoid light font weights, avoid blue as any semantic color, avoid anything that reads as "default Tailwind."

---

## Typography

**Font family:** Satoshi (fallback: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif)

_No monospace or separate display typeface — Satoshi serves all text roles._

### Type Scale

| Step | Size | Rem | Tailwind Class | Swift Method | Usage |
|------|------|-----|----------------|--------------|-------|
| xs | 12px | 0.750rem | `text-xs` | `.dsFont.sizeXs` | Captions, legal text, overlines |
| sm | 13px | 0.8125rem | `text-sm` | `.dsFont.sizeSm` | Labels, metadata, secondary captions |
| base | 14px | 0.875rem | `text-base` | `.dsFont.sizeBase` | Body copy, default text |
| lg | 16px | 1.000rem | `text-lg` | `.dsFont.sizeLg` | Body large, card descriptions |
| xl | 20px | 1.250rem | `text-xl` | `.dsFont.sizeXl` | Subheadings, card titles |
| 2xl | 24px | 1.500rem | `text-2xl` | `.dsFont.size2xl` | Section headings, modal titles |
| 3xl | 32px | 2.000rem | `text-3xl` | `.dsFont.size3xl` | Page headings, article titles |
| 4xl | 40px | 2.500rem | `text-4xl` | `.dsFont.size4xl` | Hero headings |
| 5xl | 48px | 3.000rem | `text-5xl` | `.dsFont.size5xl` | Display / landing hero titles |

## Spacing

**Base unit:** 4px grid (Tailwind default: `--spacing: 4px`)

| Step | Value | Semantic Alias | Tailwind Class | Swift Property | Usage |
|------|-------|----------------|----------------|----------------|-------|
| 1 | 4px | — | `p-1` / `m-1` / `gap-1` | — | Icon internal padding, tight inline gaps |
| 2 | 8px | stack-gap | `p-2` / `m-2` / `gap-2` | `DSSpacing().stackGap` | Stack gap (icon to label), tight list items |
| 3 | 12px | component-gap, input-padding | `p-3` / `m-3` / `gap-3` | `DSSpacing().componentGap` / `DSSpacing().inputPadding` | Component gap, input internal padding |
| 4 | 16px | card-padding | `p-4` / `m-4` / `gap-4` | `DSSpacing().cardPadding` | Card internal padding, form field spacing |
| 5 | 20px | — | `p-5` / `m-5` / `gap-5` | — | Medium layout gaps |
| 6 | 24px | page-margin | `p-6` / `m-6` / `gap-6` | `DSSpacing().pageMargin` | Page outer margin, container padding |
| 8 | 32px | section-padding | `p-8` / `m-8` / `gap-8` | `DSSpacing().sectionPadding` | Section padding, major layout blocks |
| 10 | 40px | — | `p-10` / `m-10` / `gap-10` | — | Large section separators |
| 12 | 48px | — | `p-12` / `m-12` / `gap-12` | — | Component height reference (buttons, inputs) |
| 16 | 64px | — | `p-16` / `m-16` / `gap-16` | — | Hero / banner vertical padding |
| 20 | 80px | — | `p-20` / `m-20` / `gap-20` | — | Large hero sections |
| 24 | 96px | — | `p-24` / `m-24` / `gap-24` | — | Full-bleed section separators |
| 32 | 128px | — | `p-32` / `m-32` / `gap-32` | — | Maximum page-level spacing |

## Border Radius

| Step | Value | CSS Class | Swift Constant | Usage |
|------|-------|-----------|----------------|-------|
| sm | 8px | `rounded-sm` | `DSRadius.sm` | Inputs, small elements, tags |
| md | 16px | `rounded-md` | `DSRadius.md` | Buttons, cards, modals |
| lg | 24px | `rounded-lg` | `DSRadius.lg` | Large containers, bottom sheets |
| full | 9999px | `rounded-full` | `DSRadius.full` | Avatar images, pill badges only |

> Note: `rounded-full` is restricted to avatar images and badge chips. Do NOT use on buttons or cards.

| Level | Offset | Blur | Spread | Color | CSS Class | Usage |
|-------|--------|------|--------|-------|-----------|-------|
| sm | 0px 2px | 8px | 0px | `rgba(0,0,0,0.059)` | `shadow-sm` | Cards, inputs, subtle elevation |

## Components — React

Import from `@/design-system` (or the project's configured path alias).

```typescript
import { Button, Card, Input, Badge, Heading, Text } from "@/design-system";
```

| Component | Variants | Key Props | Raw HTML Never Use |
|-----------|----------|-----------|-------------------|
| `Button` | primary, secondary, destructive, ghost, outline | `variant`, `size` (sm/md/lg), `isLoading` | `<button>` |
| `Card` | — | `className` for composition | `<div className="bg-surface-raised ...">` |
| `Input` | — | `size` (sm/md/lg), `error` (boolean) | `<input>` |
| `Badge` | default, success, error, warning, info | `variant` | `<span className="... rounded-full ...">` |
| `Heading` | — | `level` (1–4) renders as h1–h4 | `<h1>`, `<h2>`, `<h3>`, `<h4>` |
| `Text` | primary, secondary, muted | `variant`, `size` (sm/base/lg), `as` (p/span/div) | `<p className="text-text ...">` |

---

## Components — SwiftUI

Import from the generated `DesignSystem` Swift package.

| Component | Variants | Key Properties | Never Use Instead |
|-----------|----------|----------------|-------------------|
| `DSButton` | primary, secondary, destructive, ghost, outline | `variant`, `size` (sm/md/lg), `isLoading` | `Button { }` directly |
| `DSCard` | — | `content` ViewBuilder | `VStack` with manual background/radius |
| `DSInput` | — | `text` (Binding<String>), `size`, `isError` | `TextField(` directly |
| `DSBadge` | default, success, error, warning, info | `variant`, `label` | `Text` with `.clipShape(Capsule())` |
| `DSHeading` | — | `level` (1–4), `text` | `Text` with manual font stack |
| `DSText` | primary, secondary, muted | `variant`, `size` (sm/base/lg) | `Text` with `.foregroundColor(Color.ds*)` |
